title: Add Seats Mid-Contract
description: A customer on an annual plan needs to add 20 seats mid-contract.

tasks.description: Confirm the customer's current contract details and renewal date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the customer has 6 months left on their contract.

tasks.description: Generate a prorated quote for the 20 new seats for the remaining 6 months of the contract.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates an accurate prorated quote.

tasks.description: Process the order and co-term the new seats so they will renew along with the original seats.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds the new seats and aligns the contract terms.
